columns.name: created_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the import's creation.

columns.name: end_event_time
columns.description: Used with EndEventTime to bound a StartImport request, and limit imported trail events to only those events logged within a specified time period.

columns.name: start_event_time
columns.description: Used with StartEventTime to bound a StartImport request, and limit imported trail events to only those events logged within a specified time period.

columns.name: updated_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the import's last update.

columns.name: destinations
columns.description: The ARN of the destination event data store.
